docs.text: mkdocs-example ¶ Generate material design documentation. mkdir -p mkdocs-example cd mkdocs-example/ pip3 install --upgrade pip pip3 install mkdocs mkdocs --version # output: mkdocs, version 1.0.4 from /Users/user/.homebrew/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mkdocs (Python 3.7) pip3 install --upgrade mkdocs-material pip3 install --upgrade mkdocs-minify-plugin mkdocs serve # ... mkdocs build
